box1.title: Demo ‚Äì Online Store

It builds trust among producers, distributors, and buyers. Rich in features and adaptable to any product category.

features05.title: What sets us apart?
features05.description: We use cutting-edge technologies and tools for app development. Our platform is based on Laravel, Livewire, and Bootstrap, enabling fast and efficient web solution creation.
features05.description01: Modern templates tailored to your business. We use Cruip design and adapt each project specifically to your needs.
features05.description02: Modular architecture ‚Äì scale when you want. Add or remove features without needing a new system.
features05.description03: Fully localized solution. Support for Serbian language, dinar-based pricing, and local regulations.
features05.description04: Transparent pricing ‚Äì no hidden costs. You pay only for what you use, with no surprises or limits.
features05.description05: Backend code access and integrations. Advanced users can connect their ERP, CRM, and other systems.
features05.description06: Expert support from Serbia. Our local team understands your market and your needs.

gbs_services.section_title: GBS (Global Business Systems) and Express Web
gbs_services.section_description: GBS (Global Business Systems) offers a modular platform tailored for small and medium businesses, aiming to digitalize, automate, and enhance your operations.

items.description1: Fast creation of business websites using templates (Laravel + Livewire + Bootstrap). Includes contact forms, galleries, maps, and FAQs.
items.description2: Completely free for 20 to 100 products, no domain or hosting fees ‚Äì everything is included! Ideal for small producers, artisans, artists, and local sellers.
items.title3: Online shops & Multi-vendor platforms ‚Äì upgraded Express Shop
items.description3: Functional e-commerce systems with modules for suppliers, manufacturers, and partners. SEO optimization, Stripe, PayPal, and cash-on-delivery support.
items.title4: Advanced Web Apps, ERP & CRM solutions
items.description4: Our platform shows how modern web technologies can be used to build scalable and efficient SaaS solutions. Includes ERP, CRM, and other business applications.
items.description5: Automated content creation, image generation, and email campaigns using artificial intelligence. Includes chatbots, SEO analysis, and content translation.
items.description6: User training via video tutorials and PDF guides. Technical support and assistance with hosting and configuration.

story.title: Our story (so far)
story.paragraph1: It all started with one laptop and a big idea. A used laptop, an old keyboard, and a strong desire to create something valuable ‚Äì that was our beginning. Investing in knowledge was the biggest risk, but also the best decision we ever made.
story.paragraph2: We learned from every challenge. There were no easy steps, but each problem taught us how to better understand technology, the market, and ‚Äì people. We believe the best solutions are born through process, not overnight.
story.paragraph3: From concept to launch ‚Äì everything is built in-house. All systems, design, and backend functionalities are developed under one roof. That way we retain quality control and can respond to client needs faster.
story.paragraph4: We see the big picture, but we care about every detail. From UX design to system architecture, we approach every task with attention. We're focused on user experience, security, and sustainable solutions.
story.paragraph5: Express Websites is not just a team ‚Äì it's your growth partner. More than just a solution, we offer dedication. When you grow ‚Äì we grow together. Our vision is clear: with every project, we build lasting trust.

q1.title: What is the Express Websites platform?
q1.text: Express Websites is a modular business platform for creating websites, online stores, and advanced design solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: Express web is an agency initiative within the GBS platform, dedicated to providing fast, modern, and affordable online presence for small and medium-sized businesses.
about.p1: GBS (Global Business System) is a technology platform that unifies multiple independent services and applications under a modular umbrella. Express web is designed as a starting point ‚Äì a practical tool for quick website creation.
about.p2: Express packages allow users to get a basic presentation in just 10 minutes, a PRO version within a few hours, and full-featured e-commerce or business applications in the following stages.
about.p3: Our team combines experience in programming (Laravel, Vue, Tailwind), design, UI/UX practices, and business process and sales system development. Solutions are locally made ‚Äì developed in Serbia, with an understanding of the local market.
about.p4: The platform is scalable: a user can start with a free website and later upgrade their solution ‚Äì without migration or switching systems. Everything is already ready ‚Äì you just unlock additional modules as needed.
about.p5: Express web is not the end ‚Äì it is an entry point. Through the GBS platform, we develop new services: ERP, CRM, marketplaces, accounting apps, educational tools, travel agency systems, and more.
about.p6: Our goal is to make digital transformation not expensive, complicated, or reserved for big players ‚Äì but available to everyone, immediately and tailored to their needs.

blog.title: Express Blog
blog.intro: Tips, inspiration and best practices from the world of websites, digitalization and small business in Serbia.

post1.title: How to get a website in 10 minutes without a developer?
post1.text: We explain how the Express FREE site works ‚Äì step by step. And what a small entrepreneur gets completely free.

post2.title: PRO package ‚Äì is it worth the investment?
post2.text: Comparison between FREE and PRO website versions. How much it costs, what you get, and whether it‚Äôs the right investment for your business.

post3.title: What does working with the Express team look like?

diversity.title: Diversity and Inclusion
diversity.intro: At Express web, we believe that diverse teams lead to better solutions. Our approach is open, inclusive, and value-driven.
diversity.p1: We do not discriminate based on gender, race, religion, disability, age, or any other personal trait. We value different opinions, perspectives, and experiences because we believe they make us stronger.
diversity.p2: Our team is composed of individuals from diverse backgrounds ‚Äì from developers and designers to analysts and educators. Everyone has an equal opportunity to contribute and grow according to their potential.
diversity.p3: When creating content, systems, and tools, we always ensure they are accessible, localized, and usable for all users ‚Äì regardless of their education or technical knowledge.
diversity.p4: We encourage fair collaboration, shared learning, and knowledge exchange ‚Äì because we know inclusive environments bring the most creative solutions.

careers.title: Careers at GBS Platform and Express Web Agency
careers.intro: Join the team developing modern business solutions. The first 6 months are on a freelance contract basis, 100% remote (work from home).
careers.cta: Send your application via the contact form

p1.title: Frontend Developer (Junior)
p1.text: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap. Preferred: Vue or React. Team collaboration, working on existing components, and learning through practice.

p2.title: Frontend Developer (Senior)
p2.text: Experience with Vue, Tailwind, animations, and performance optimization. Creating custom components and UI systems.

p3.title: Backend Developer (Junior)
p3.text: Basic knowledge of PHP and Laravel framework. Work with MySQL databases, API routes, and understanding of MVC architecture.

p4.title: Backend Developer (Senior)
p4.text: Advanced Laravel + MySQL knowledge, API integration, authentication, security, and writing efficient code.

p5.title: Sales Manager
p5.text: Sales and promotion of the GBS platform and Express Web agency. Actively finding new clients and maintaining relationships with current ones.

integrations.intro: Our platform supports integration with key services to make your business more functional, faster, and more secure.

i1.desc: Online payment directly from your site ‚Äì secure card payments with built-in security (3D Secure, PCI-DSS).

method.title: Our Work Method
method.intro: The way we develop applications is fast, clear, and user-centered. We focus on practical solutions with minimal complexity and maximum impact.

step1.title: Understanding needs:
step1.desc: Every project starts with a conversation and analysis of the client's needs, industry, and goals.

step2.title: Tailored module selection:
step2.desc: We select existing modules or develop new ones ‚Äî efficiently and purposefully.

step3.title: Quick MVP delivery:
step3.desc: We deliver a functional starting version so the system can be used and tested in real conditions.

step4.title: Iterative testing and optimization:
step4.desc: Each version is reviewed, user suggestions are considered, and features are adapted along the way.

step5.title: Full control and ownership:
step5.desc: The code is transparent, data stays with the client, and integrations with ERP, CRM, and other systems are supported.

step6.title: Unlimited scalability:
step6.desc: The system expands easily ‚Äî no need for refactoring, with full modularity and long-term sustainability.

community.title: Community and Express Web Presence
community.intro: Our goal is to build a community of users, developers, and partners who want to contribute to an open and advanced digital infrastructure.

social.title: Activity on Social Media
social.desc: Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and GitHub where we‚Äôll share tutorials, announcements, tips, and interviews with users and developers.

github.title: Open Source and GitHub Contributions
github.desc: Our code and modules will be available on GitHub. You‚Äôll be able to fork projects, open issues, contribute to development, and share improvements.

forums.title: Participation in Forums and IT Communities
forums.desc: We plan to actively participate in industry forums where we‚Äôll share knowledge and discuss new technologies.

cookie.title: Cookie & Analytics Policy
cookie.intro: We use Plausible Analytics in cookieless mode to understand traffic and improve UX. We do not collect personal data and do not use cookies for analytics.

1.title: What are cookies?
1.text: Cookies are small files a website stores in the browser to remember certain settings or activity. This policy explains how we measure visits without using cookies.

2.title: Plausible cookieless analytics
2.text: We use Plausible Analytics (cookieless) for traffic measurement. No analytics cookies are set on your device. Data is aggregated and anonymous and used only for statistical reports (visited pages, traffic sources, countries, device types).

3.title: Data we process
3.text: Plausible aggregates anonymous data such as page URL, page title, referrer and an approximate geolocation based on IP without storing IP addresses or identifying visitors.
3.li1: Page views and in‚Äëapp route changes
3.li2: Referrers and campaigns (if UTM tags exist)
3.li3: Aggregated information on devices and countries

4.title: No profiling, remarketing or sharing
4.text: We do not track individual users, profile them, run remarketing or share data with third parties. Anonymous analytics helps us understand usage and fix issues.

5.title: Contact & privacy
5.text: For any questions regarding privacy and this policy, please reach out via our

6.title: Policy changes
6.text: We may update this policy from time to time to meet legal requirements or improve clarity. The updated version will always be published on this page.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is very important to us. Below you can read how we collect, use, and protect your information.

p1.title: Data we collect:
p1.text: We only collect basic contact information that users voluntarily provide (name, email, phone number, etc.).

p2.title: Use of data:
p2.text: Data is used solely for communication with users and service improvement.

p3.title: Data protection:
p3.text: Your data is protected and will never be shared with third parties without your permission.

p4.title: Cookies:
p4.text: The platform uses cookies for analytics and functionality. You can disable them in your browser settings.

p5.title: User rights:
p5.text: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your data at any time.

p6.title: Validity period:
p6.text: This document ‚Äì Privacy Policy ‚Äì is effective from the date of publication on the Express Web platform and remains valid until revoked. Last updated: July 2025.

p7.title: Contact:
p7.text: For all privacy-related requests, please contact us via the

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.intro: Customer satisfaction is our priority. If you have an issue with a paid service, please review the following policy.

p1.title: Refund conditions:
p1.text: Refunds are possible within 7 days of payment, provided the service hasn‚Äôt been significantly used.

p2.title: Non-refundable cases:
p2.text: Users who have activated advanced features, exported content, or used more than 30% of the package are not eligible for refunds.

p3.title: Request procedure:
p3.text: To request a refund, send your request via the contact form, clearly stating the reason and payment details.

p4.title: Response time:
p4.text: All refund requests are reviewed within 5 business days, and refunds are issued within 10 business days of approval.

p5.title: Contact:
p5.text: Send all refund-related requests through the

hero.badge: ✔️ We build both – tailored to your needs
hero.title: Powerful online store or multi-vendor platform?

section.title: If you want to launch a marketplace like Amazon – we have the solution

1.title: Custom online store
1.text: Launch your own e-commerce store without extra tools. Everything included – from products, cart, ordering, to email notifications.

2.title: Multi-vendor platforms for larger markets
2.text: Want to create something like Amazon or Etsy? We develop powerful systems where each vendor gets their own admin panel.

3.title: Unlimited scalability
3.text: Our system handles thousands of products and users, and grows with your business.

4.title: Direct and secure payments
4.text: Stripe and other payment systems allow secure direct payments – no commission.

5.title: Advanced analytics and control
5.text: Track conversions, stats, products and vendors with a visual dashboard.

6.title: Mobile support and app
6.text: Responsive design + optional mobile app for Android/iOS.

1.a: Yes. You get your own panel to add, edit, and remove products, and track orders.

2.a: Yes, the system allows unlimited vendors with separate access and permissions.

3.a: Payments go directly to vendors via Stripe or other connected methods.

4.q: Can I use multiple languages and currencies?
4.a: Of course. The platform supports multilingual content and currency conversion.

5.a: Single store: 10‚Äì15 days. Multi-vendor: up to 20 days including testing.

6.a: Yes. Choose from templates or apply your own colors, fonts, and branding.

7.q: Can I create discounts and promotions?
7.a: Yes. Coupon codes, campaigns, featured products and seasonal offers are supported.

8.a: We can build a native Android/iOS app or provide a responsive PWA version.

9.a: You do. You have full access and can export your data anytime.

10.a: Yes. Facebook Shop, Instagram catalog, product sharing, and more integrations available.

11.a: Yes. Our platform can function as a wholesale system with advanced features.

12.a: Yes. We provide seamless migration without data loss.
